definition: to put the blame on/to accuse

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: He ascribed his failure to objective conditions.
sentences.chinese: 他把失敗歸咎於客觀條件。

sentences.english: Such images have contributed to the taboo against marriage between first cousins.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的病態歸咎於對近親結婚禁忌的違背。

sentences.english: This is due to the fact that Euler angles are always expressed relative to the global coordinate system.
sentences.chinese: 這歸咎於歐拉角總是以球座標系表示。

sentences.english: It's wrong to ascribe all that have happen simply to the war.
sentences.chinese: 把發生的一切歸咎於戰爭是錯誤的。

sentences.english: Health experts are worried that a new, more virulent strain may be to blame.
sentences.chinese: 衛生專家擔心這一現象歸咎於一種毒力更強的新菌種。

sentences.english: In the second century Galen pinned it on a dryness of the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 二世紀時，蓋倫將口喫歸咎於舌頭乾燥。

sentences.english: Seoul and Washington have blamed the sinking of the Cheonan on the North.
sentences.chinese: 韓國和美國都將天安艦事件歸咎於朝鮮方面。

sentences.english: They attributed the damage to the effect of dampness during the long sea voyage .
sentences.chinese: 他們把損失歸咎於長途海運中受潮了。

sentences.english: Carelessness deserves the blame for many accidents.
sentences.chinese: 許多事故歸咎於粗心大意。

sentences.english: The barrenness of their effort is due to poor management.
sentences.chinese: 他們努力的徒勞無益歸咎於管理不善。

sentences.english: Authorities attributed this phenomenon to the country lacks water resources, hydroelectric power stations.
sentences.chinese: 當局將此現象歸咎於該國水力發電站的水力資源缺乏。

sentences.english: Most accidents are blamed on poor maintenance and human error.
sentences.chinese: 大多數事故歸咎於很差的維修保養和人爲失誤。

sentences.english: The police imputes the rise in crime to high unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 警方把犯罪增加的原因歸咎於失業率太高。

sentences.english: The current pessimism is part of a historical economic inferiority complex.
sentences.chinese: 目前的悲觀情緒可以部分歸咎於歷史的經濟自卑感。

sentences.english: Is there anything you’re blaming others for in your life?
sentences.chinese: 在生活中有沒有什麼事情，你總是歸咎於別人的問題？
